name: ulterior
content:
ulterior motive, reason, purpose, etc.
Add to word list
Add to word list
a secret purpose or reason for doing something: He claims he just wants to help Lisa but I suspect he has an ulterior motive.

(of a reason) hidden or secret: She had no ulterior motive for helping them out – she just wanted to do it.
